name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro (128GB)

name: Samsung Galaxy S23 (128GB)
description: Compact Android flagship with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, bright 120Hz AMOLED, and sharp day and night photos.

images.alt: Samsung Galaxy S23 in phantom black

name: Google Pixel 8 (128GB)
description: Pixel with Tensor G3, clean Android, and industry-leading computational photography for stunning portraits and night shots.

reviews.comment: Best photos I've taken on a phone.

name: OnePlus 11 (256GB)
description: Performance-focused smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 100W fast charging, and Hasselblad-tuned cameras.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Headphones
description: Premium over-ear noise-canceling headphones with outstanding sound, comfort, and multi-point Bluetooth connectivity.

name: Apple MacBook Air 13-inch (M2, 8GB/256GB)
description: Ultralight laptop with Apple's M2 chip, fanless design, all-day battery, and a bright Liquid Retina display.

images.alt: MacBook Air M2 open on a desk

description: Premium 13-inch ultrabook with near-borderless display, solid performance, and elegant build quality.
